code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     DozerConfiguration config = new DozerConfiguration().     config.setName(remaining).     config.setMappingConfiguration(getAndRemoveOrResolveReferenceParameter(parameters, "mappingConfiguration", DozerBeanMapperConfiguration.class)).     setProperties(config, parameters).     // Validate endpoint parameters     if (config.getTargetModel() == null) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("The targetModel parameter is required for dozer endpoints").     }     return new DozerEndpoint(uri, this, config). }
